verses.verse: And if his oblation <S%H7133><s%> be a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offering <S%H8002><s%>, if he offer <S%H7126><s%> it of the herd <S%H1241><s%>; whether it be a male <S%H2145><s%> or female <S%H5347><s%>, he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it without blemish <S%H8549><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And he shall lay <S%H5564><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of his offering <S%H7133><s%>, and kill <S%H7819><s%> it at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>: and Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the peace offering <S%H8002><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covereth <S%H3680><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%>, and all the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is upon the inwards <S%H7130><s%>, fat: or, suet

And the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is on them, which is by the flanks <S%H3689><s%>, and the caul <S%H3508><s%> above the liver <S%H3516><s%>, with the kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, it shall he take away <S%H5493><s%>. caul: or, midriff over the liver, and over the kidneys

And Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> it on the altar <S%H4196><s%> upon the burnt sacrifice <S%H5930><s%>, which is upon the wood <S%H6086><s%> that is on the fire <S%H784><s%>: it is an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And if his offering <S%H7133><s%> for a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offering <S%H8002><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be of the flock <S%H6629><s%>; male <S%H2145><s%> or female <S%H5347><s%>, he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it without blemish <S%H8549><s%>.
If he offer <S%H7126><s%> a lamb <S%H3775><s%> for his offering <S%H7133><s%>, then shall he offer <S%H7126><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And he shall lay <S%H5564><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of his offering <S%H7133><s%>, and kill <S%H7819><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>: and Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> shall sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the peace offering <S%H8002><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; the fat <S%H2459><s%> thereof, and the whole <S%H8549><s%> rump <S%H451><s%>, it shall he take off <S%H5493><s%> hard <S%H5980><s%> by the backbone <S%H6096><s%>; and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covereth <S%H3680><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%>, and all the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is upon the inwards <S%H7130><s%>,

And the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is upon them, which is by the flanks <S%H3689><s%>, and the caul <S%H3508><s%> above the liver <S%H3516><s%>, with the kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, it shall he take away <S%H5493><s%>.
And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>: it is the food <S%H3899><s%> of the offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
And if his offering <S%H7133><s%> be a goat <S%H5795><s%>, then he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And he shall lay <S%H5564><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of it, and kill <S%H7819><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>: and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> thereof his offering <S%H7133><s%>, even an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covereth <S%H3680><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%>, and all the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is upon the inwards <S%H7130><s%>,

And the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is upon them, which is by the flanks <S%H3689><s%>, and the caul <S%H3508><s%> above the liver <S%H3516><s%>, with the kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, it shall he take away <S%H5493><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> them upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>: it is the food <S%H3899><s%> of the offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%>: all the fat <S%H2459><s%> is the LORD'S <S%H3068><s%>.

It shall be a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> statute <S%H2708><s%> for your generations <S%H1755><s%> throughout all your dwellings <S%H4186><s%>, that ye eat <S%H398><s%> neither fat <S%H2459><s%> nor blood <S%H1818><s%>.
